price: 58. Wana ezali kati ya mikapo tozali kotangela yo mpe Emoniseli ya bwányá.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ نَتۡلُوهُ عَلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَٱلذِّكۡرِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: dhālika natlūhu ʿalayka mina al-āyāti wal-dhik'ri al-ḥakīmi
